conclusion: Plan to analyze image to understand layout and flow of liquid through baffles.
Image shows containers A, B, C at top and containers D, E at bottom connected by baffles.
Liquid will flow out from containers A, B, and C.
Flow path is determined by baffles directing liquid to one of the two containers below.
Baffles lead liquid from A, B, and C towards container D.
Positioning of baffles indicates liquid will follow path into container D.
Based on flow path and direction of baffles, liquid will flow into container D.
